messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Colin Powell
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/5/2003 5:34:55 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... See what happens when you re not GLUED to the TV! He gave the U.S. reasons for needing to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/5/2003 5:34:55 PM Eastern Standard Time,
shyrley.williams@... writes:
> What Colin POwell coverage? I've been in bed with a migraine all day. Have I
> missed something?
>
> Shyrley

See what happens when you're not GLUED to the TV!

He gave the U.S. reasons for needing to oust Saddam Hussein. 1.5 hours with
responses from the U. K., China, France, Russia, Cameroon (!?), and finally
Iraq. ALL the news today, Shyrley!

Don't worry, it'll be repeated all night and all day tomorrow probably. You
won't miss much.

Effects us directly as Ben is with the Air National Guard.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
